title: AI promises to shape a future for billions
description: THE relentless march of artificial intelligence (AI) continues, raising both immense hopes and daunting anxieties. Amid the hype and uncertainty, a beacon of clarity emerged at the Heidelberg Laureate Forum, courtesy of two giants in the field: Jeff Dean and David Patterson. Their presentation, “Shaping AI’s Impact to Help Billions,” wasn’t just another technical overview; it was a call to action, a blueprint for steering AI toward a future where its benefits are broadly shared and its potential harms are proactively mitigated.

title: Adobe struggles to assure investors that it can thrive in AI era
description: Adobe Inc. brought together 10,000 marketers, filmmakers and content creators to its annual conference this week to persuade them that the company's software products are adapting to artificial intelligence and remain the best tools for their work.

title: Amazon’s cloud acceleration calms investor fears of AI bubble
description: Amazon.com Inc. posted robust cloud growth that reassured investors that the tens of billions of dollars the company and its peers are pouring into artificial intelligence will pay off.
content:

title: Meta defies AI spending gloom with record-breaking bond sale
description: Meta Platforms Inc. found record-shattering demand for its bond sale on Thursday even as its shares plunged, in a sign that bond investors are looking past any concerns about its artificial-intelligence spending plans.
content: (Bloomberg/Caleb Mutua and Emily Graffeo) — Meta Platforms Inc. found record-shattering demand for its bond sale on Thursday even as its shares plunged, in a sign that bond investors are looking past any concerns about its artificial-intelligence spe... [5060 chars]

title: Meta to raise $30 billion in its biggest bond sale as AI expansion costs rack up
description: SOCIAL media giant Meta Platforms will raise up to $30 billion in its biggest bond offering ever, it said in a filing on Thursday, as Big Tech rushes to fund the costly expansion of artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure.
content:
SOCIAL media giant Meta Platforms will raise up to $30 billion in its biggest bond offering ever, it said in a filing on Thursday, as Big Tech rushes to fund the costly expansion of artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure.

title: Meta, xAI Starting Trend for Billions in Off-Balance Sheet Debt
description: Just this month, Meta Platforms Inc. has secured about $60 billion in capital to build data centers, part of its spending to get ahead in the artificial intelligence race. Half of that won’t show up on the social media giant’s balance sheet as debt.
content:

title: Corporate America layoffs surge as AI automation replaces thousands of jobs
description: Corporate America is cutting thousands of white-collar jobs as artificial intelligence automates routine tasks and companies right-size after pandemic hiring surges.

title: What will AI never be able to do and what can it do? Tech executives in Spain weigh in
description: AI is already a transformative reality in multiple sectors, but it poses challenges in cybersecurity and personal data protection. Experts from Microsoft, Carrefour and Iberdrola discuss the present and future of artificial intelligence.
content: Artificial intelligence (AI) is no longer a futuristic utopia that we see from afar, it is a reality that transforms everything from energy to distribution and start-ups. This is what three experts defended at the residence of the French ambassador i... [5637 chars]

title: Two AIs - Artificial Intelligence And Aspirational Indian Powering India Today: Bansuri Swaraj At TiEcon Delhi 2025
description: Speaking during TiEcon Delhi 2025, the BJP MP affirmed her faith in women-led development, saying that under Digital India, technology has become a tool for public good.

title: Will AI ‘Fundamentally Change’ Working In Live Music?
description: Artificial intelligence is already impacting promoters, agents and marketers in the live music business. Here's how AI is affecting concerts.
